name: Xe :verified: (@cadey@pony.social)
summary:
There are three major character design traits that guarantee a successful franchise:

1. A distinctive silhouette so people recognize it in smash trailers
2. Unique colors so that it's easy to visually pick them out from the crowd
3. Convincing hentai artists to draw weird porn of them for clout on social media

In this essay I will compare the cultural impact 2010 releases by analyzing the number of erotic images of popular video game characters.
